view.text:
React POC

A sample React application with potential Renaissance use cases covered.

Project Setup

This project was set up with the latest version of create-react-app and then extended/modified to come up with a more suitable started application

Changes made to base app

CSS Related

1. 

Turned on CSS modules by changing the css file names from file.css to file.module.css

2. 

Enabled SCSS by changing file.module.css to file.module.scss

3. 

Installed node-sass to support SCSS

4. 

Create variables and mixins in shared/scss/mixins(or)variables, consume by using absolute imports in other scss files

Files and Folders Structure

build : The final folder which contains the static files to serve coverage : The folder containing the LCOV report of the tests that ran node_modules : Folder with external dependencies public : Contains files to be merged for creating build src: Source code for the application

components : Contains all stand alone components
hoc : Contains all HOCs
routes : Can also be thought of as pages, essentially the containers which are loaded based on the URL
shared : All code that is shared between all potential things (components/routes/hocs/etc) 

interfaces: All interfaces used within the application
scss: All SCSS mixins and variables under their own folders and then imported into a common file for easy consumption
services: Any and all data communication services reside in here

store: Redux related files and folders 

sagas: Redux Sagas for async operations

Package Scripts

Apart from the default, few more scripts have been added

1. npm run build:prod generates the build folder without source maps
2. npm run lint run linting rules and error out if there are any
3. npm run test to run test
4. npm run test:ci to run test in CI mode

Linting

1. Extended config available in package.json eslintConfig

Tests

1. Added Enzyme to standard test setup
2. Created mock.store(.tsx) for easier testing

exports

1. No default exports, always use named imports
2. File heirarchy is as shown below lazy (imports) index (imports) container (imports) component

Other - General

1. File extensions should be .tsx only when React is imported into the file
2. All file names should be small letters.
3. Camel case filenames to be replaced with . instead

Help Needed

1. 

Enable service worker to make apps installable on desktops, enhanced caching

2. 

Make starter app
